login-fetch-error: Failed to login, try again later.
login-blocked: Contact the administrator to regain access to the account.
stream-fetch-failed: Failed to fetch the stream information, retrying in {seconds} seconds.
chat-login-required: You need to log in to chat.
name: Title
ays-new-url: Are you sure you want to generate a new link to the stream?
ays-reset-key: Are you sure you want to reset the steraming key?
ays-delete-stream: Are you sure you want to delete the stream?
failed-to-update: Failed to do specified action, try again later.
basic-info-summary: Stream title is not visible to the viewers, but only visible to you for distinguishing different livestreams.
streaming-summary: It is strongly recommended for you to reveal the credentials while your screen is not being viewed by anyone else.
url-summary: Your stream can be viewed on this URL if your "Privacy" setting is set to "Public".
chat-summary: Your stream chat can be viewed here if your "Chat Privacy" setting is set to "Public" or "Registered only".
ays-logout-sess: Are you sure you want to log out from other sessions?
pass-fetch-error: Failed to change password, try again later.
pass-changed: You have changed your account's password!
card-1-desc: Click the plus icon located at the top right to create a new stream!
card-2-desc: Set your stream privacy to "Public" and share the stream link with your friends!
card-3-desc: Use it as an alternative and less annoying way of screensharing!
reduce-motion-summary: For accessibility and battery usage sakes.
